tr.td: The incidence of histopathological findings of the thyroid gland are presented below in Table 7. This table is mandatory; limit text to integration of findings, highlights; relate with other findings, as appropriate).

g:HTMLPanel.div: TABLE 7. Incidence of Histopathological Lesions of the Thyroid Glanda
